CustomField.formula: IF(TEXT(Status__c) = 'Running',IMAGE("/resource/I8__Running","Running",20,20), IF(TEXT(Status__c) = 'Review',IMAGE("/resource/I8__Status/review.png","Review",20,20), IF(TEXT(Status__c) = 'Waiting',IMAGE("/resource/I8__waiting","Pending",17,17), IF(TEXT(Status__c) = 'Ready',IMAGE("/resource/I8__ready","Ready",21,22), IF(TEXT(Status__c) = 'Completed',IMAGE("/resource/I8__Complete","Completed",20,20), IF(TEXT(Status__c) = 'Build',IMAGE("/resource/I8__build","Build",20,20), IF(TEXT(Status__c) = 'Freeze',IMAGE("/resource/I8__Status/freeze.png","Freeze",20,20), IF(TEXT(Status__c) = 'Scheduled',IMAGE("/resource/I8__schedule","Scheduled",20,20), IF(TEXT(Status__c) = 'Abandoned',IMAGE("/resource/I8__abandon","Abandoned",20,20), IF(TEXT(Status__c) = 'Suspended',IMAGE("/resource/I8__suspend","Suspended",20,20), IF(TEXT(Status__c) = 'ReRun',IMAGE("/resource/I8__rerun","ReRun",20,20), IF(TEXT(Status__c) = 'To Be Released',IMAGE("/resource/I8__ToBeReleased","To Be Released",20,20), IF(TEXT(Status__c) = 'Completed-Jump',IMAGE("/resource/I8__completedjump","completedjump",20,20), IF(TEXT(Status__c) = 'Force Completed',IMAGE("/resource/I8__forcecomplete","Force Completed",18,18), IF(Jump__c = true,IMAGE("/resource/I8__jump","Jump",24,24), null)))))))))))))))
CustomField.label: State
